post:
Owned-Networks is a hosting company that strives to provide top-notch reliable services at affordable prices. We have been providing web hosting solutions since 2005. Here are some of our Unmanaged VPS specials (OpenVZ & KVM).
If you need a managed solution please free to contact our sales department.

We now offer KVM virtualization in Los Angeles, California!!! See our KVM plans below.
